ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | nffr.r | |- F/_ x R |
| 2 |  | nffr.a | |- F/_ x A |

| 4 | 1, 2 | #P_nffr | |- F/ x R Fr A |
| 5 | 1, 2 | #P_nfso | |- F/ x R Or A |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_nfan | |- F/ x ( R Fr A /\ R Or A ) |
| 7 | 3, 6 | #P_nfxfr | |- F/ x R We A |
